I used to have a regular tungsten ring but I lost it so I ended up buying this one. i can definitely see some differences with this white tungsten ring and a regular tungsten.

(1) color is definitely a white instead of the regular greyish tungsten. i was fine with the regular greyish color of my previous ring since it was so shiny anyway but now that I have this one, I really do like the more whitish tone. if u're looking to get something more like platinum or white gold, this is the one to get!

(2) not sure why but this white one is definitely lighter than the regular tungsten ring. this is probably better for me since I'm not used to wearing jewelry. however, I'm wondering if this is still heavier than other metals.  for sure it's lighter than the regular tungsten ring.

(3) this ring is supposed to be "comfort fit" which means it should be a little curved underneath but it looks and feels pretty similar to my old ring, which wasn't comfort fit. when I eyeball this white tungsten ring, it doesn't look curved underneath at all, but when i feel it, it does have a slight curvature. very subtle.  nevertheless, feels pretty comfortable.

(4) the white tungsten ring doesn't seem to stay as shiny but I think it's because it's not as dark as the regular tungsten so smudges are slightly more noticeable (but very slightly....Maybe I'm being a little to picky), so no real big deal on that.

overall, I personally like the white tungsten over the regular (greyish) tungsten mainly because of the color and partly because of the lighter weight.

reviewText:
I purchased this at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

I bought this necklace for someone who is very close to me who digs fossils as a hobby.  I hoped that it would be a nice necklace and not too much!  This necklace has exceeded my expectations.  It came nicely packaged with several layers of wrappings to ensure that it arrived safely.  A soft pouch and a thank-you sticker let me know how much the seller appreciates their customers.

The dinosaur skeleton is articulated in several places.  You may notice that it does not have any forearms, but that is for the best since it would throw off the way the necklace hangs.  I purchased the gold finish, but I think it would look attractive in any of the other finishes.  For a fun piece of jewelry like this, you don't necessarily want to spend too much, but you don't want it to look cheap either.  This necklace is very eye-catching but it doesn't look junky in person, which I appreciate.

The chain itself is not very long, so the necklace hangs on the upper chest of the wearer.  The way it lays is very attractive and displays the necklace to its best advantage.
summary: Fun necklace that arrives well-packaged and doesn't look cheap!

reviewText:
So cute! This item came as it appears in the picture and as described by the seller and I was happy to see that it was as big as I had anticipated (it hangs from my collar bone to just above my bust). Each of the bone links feel sturdy and sections are connected by thick rings allowing movement and the skeleton to contour well. While the necklace isn't adjustable per se (it has a single larger ring at the back which the lobster clasp connects to), since the chain is made from links you could shorten it a little bit more without interfering with how the skeleton lays.

Cons:
- Keep in mind this item is an alloy and so has a slight metallic smell to it (kind of like old pennies or bronze candle sticks).
- Follow the care instructions the seller has on this page! I imagine it would get rather hot in direct sunlight and the antiquing is likely to be messed up by cleaning products.
- This ships internationally, so if you live in the States keep in mind it will take awhile to find you. I purchased this on April 17th and it was expected to be here May 9th, but I got it earlier on April 29th - in my experience that is very fast for postal service!

I received this item at a discount in return for an honest review.

This is one of my new favorite necklaces! It super cute and surprisingly comfortable to wear. I thought that the legs hanging off-center might bother me, but I barely noticed. I've worn this necklace several times since I've purchased it and every single time I get so many compliments. Although many people were unable to tell what the necklace was until they looked at it closer. It's great watching their faces light up when they realize it's a necklace of t-rex bones.
The necklace itself is quality made. It is not lightweight or flimsy feeling. The chain is sturdy and I have no concerns of it breaking. I also like that this necklace is adjustable so I can wear it long or short.
If you want a great conversation starter, or just to be the envy of your friends, this is the necklace for you!
summary: Great necklace, quality made, matches with most outfits

reviewText:
I absolutely adore this necklace! My son's upcoming birthday party has a dinosaur theme - it's the perfect accessory for the host! I love where it lays, it's very flattering, and adorable! I'm thinking of purchasing a few more as a gift to other moms attending, plus maybe the gold one for myself! I also wanted to point out the product packaging - it was very well packaged and arrived in perfect condition. It comes with a box and a little cloth bag.

I received this necklace at a discount in exchange for an honest review. All opinions expressed are 100% mine, unbiased, and given only after I have thoroughly tested each item. I am committed to providing completely honest and accurate feedback.

I ordered the bronze colored necklace and when I got it in the mail, it came with a nice black bag to keep it safe. When I took the necklace out of the bag, I noticed that the necklace was not assembled correctly. I decided that to be fair, I would contact the seller and give them a chance to fix the necklace. I emailed the seller,, and sent  in a picture. They apologized for the defective necklace and said that I could fix it myself and wear it or throw it away. Whatever I chose to do was ok with them, They asked which color of necklace I would like to have the replacement in, so I selected the black color. They also stated that  the replacement would take longer to be shipped as it would't  be shipped from Amazon. I appreciated the heads up.

I received the black one today, and I love it! The chain is sturdy, and the black is shiny and  fun to play with.  I thought that the skeleton would have been smaller, but  I was delightfully surprised at the size.

I would recommend this necklace to anyone!

I did receive a discount on this item in exchange for a fair and honest review.

I thought this was a fan type of necklace when I ordered it, but in fact, there are sections of the T-Rex skeleton, rather than individual bones, joined by jump rings.  If you look closely at the photo, you can see the sections:  head and upper neck, lower neck and shoulders/arms, top  portion of ribcage, lower ribcage and gut area, hips/legs, and then there are 5 tail pieces.  The metal that the skeleton is made from appears to be solid brass.  It is not the really shiny brass (think: gold wannabe), but a more muted one, although there is definitely shine to it.  The chain is either steel or plated steel, since it sticks to the magnet on the back of my phone.

On the clasp, there is a small disk dangling that says Jane on top and Stone on the bottom, and on the center of the back is a small crystal, that sparkles like a diamond (although I am sure it is not), which is a very nice effect.

The item name says that it is a choker, which made me nervous, because those often feel like they're actually trying to choke you.  This is actually a necklace.  It measures roughly 20-22 inches to the first jump ring, and 22-24 inches to the second jump ring, so the length depends on which one you select.  (Unfortunately, I don't have a tape measure, I used ceiling tiles to estimate a measurement).

I ordered this for my granddaughter, but I like it so much that I may order another for myself.

I purchased this necklace at a reduced price in exchange for writing an unbiased review of this product, which is what I have given.
summary: Cute dinosaur necklace suitable for adults

reviewText:
SO CUTE!!  This is great quality and really looks like a t-rex skeleton.  It is held together very well and feels sturdy but is still light weight.  This would be a fantastic give for any dinosaur fan.  It has gotten a lot of compliments in just one day.  Love it!

I received this product for free or at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest review.

If you love Jurassic Park, this necklace is for you. It's not as big as I expected it to be, but it is large enough that people a few feet away can tell what it is. This necklace doesn't get snagged on your hair, but the bones can flip around if you are wearing this during activity. At one point, it looked like he died from snapping his legs backwards.... that's my only pet peeve with it. In every other respect, I love it!

I love fun costume-y jewelry (I'm a big kid at heart, I'll always love cute jewelry) and this necklace was a good purchase indeed!
I ordered this necklace in shiny gold, there were so many options that I had a tough time picking because they're all so pretty. It's shinier than in the photo.

 The dinosaur is pretty large and long so it drapes across my entire chest, the chain is long with two loops for different lengths. I like wearing mine on the closer of the two loops so the dinosaur is a little longer and flatter. On the last loop it looks more "upright". It looks surprisingly sophisticated with a collared black dress on with the chain tucked under the collar. First night out I got so many compliments and "where did you get that awesome t-rex necklace" comments that it was overwhelming! Don't wear this if you hate being the center of attention!

The packaging the necklace was shipped in is very secure and it arrived in pristine condition. It was inside bubble wrap that was in a small plastic bag that was in a fabric pouch that was bubble wrapped. Honestly, the only con I can think of is- where are it's arms? My dino has awesome little jointed legs but no arms. For My review I was allowed to purchase this at a discounted price, my opinion is 100% my own.

This came in the most protected packaging ever. They even provided a little jewlery bag which was much appreciated. This necklace is definitely a statement piece and is even better in person. I got the antique gold and absolutely love it. It feels well made too. I cannot wait to wear this necklace. I'm going to pair it with a plain top because this necklace is meant to stand out!

This is really an adorable necklace! I wish the arms moved, but other than that, I love it! I originally got it for one of my daughters, but now, both my daughters and myself fight over who's it is.  We've decided to take turns.  I like the antiqued look of it, and the way it hangs with the legs free swinging so it looks like it's walking with you. It came to us in a nice black velvet bag too! Very pleased!

I received my necklace today and I absolutely LOVE It. My child's think I'm the coolest mom. It's beautiful in every aspect, I HIGHLY recommend buying this product. It is a little on the heavy side but still A GREAT Piece of jewelry.

reviewText:
Such a cute dinosaur necklace!. Even though the pictures on this product were detailed, I didn't expect so many sections of this necklace to be individually hinged. That kind of detail is not something I see every day in costume jewelry. As a number of other reviewers have said. the necklace is also quite a bit larger than I was expecting.

The necklace is a little difficult to wear because it has so many jointed sections. If you have a little one in your life, they'll be entertained for hours. And good news: against every good advice I've ever given myself, I have worn this necklace twice so far without any treatment and without any skin irritation. Win!

I chose the silver color of this necklace. This finish is very, very shiny -- almost like a chrome. If that's what you're looking for, it looks cool. It's a little hard for me to mix that into my wardrobe, so next time I might choose a different finish. Whatever the color, this is a statement piece. If you wear it, people notice (in a good way).

I recommend this necklace to anyone looking for super fun costume jewelry and of course to all lovers of paleontology.

I purchased this necklace at a discount in exchange for writing this honest and unbiased review.
summary: Cute necklace, silver finish is very shiny

reviewText:
It is a decent ring. I have had it for about six months now and it has not dinged or been scratched up. The only downfall is that the sizing is a little off. It seems that they run a bit snug, which sadly makes it to the point that I can almost not wear mine comfortably. I wear a size 5.5 and that is what I ordered, but it felt similar to a 5. So just be prepared to order a size or a half up so that you can wear the ring comfortably.

Aside from sizing, the ring is absolutely beautiful. It can easily be used for ring stacking, but is also just a gorgeous band. I originally bought it as a substitute to my large wedding ring. However, it stacks nicely underneath the ring's halo and looks stunning. It looks like real rose gold, and because the material is tungsten it does not scratch.

Overall, a beautiful piece, it just runs a bit snug. I would definitely buy again and would definitely recommend to a friend.
summary: Material. Sizing is Small. Beautiful. Looks Real!

reviewText:
I'd give this five stars for the shape and fit of the ring itself. The band itself is very smooth and has a good weight to it that makes it feel a lot more expensive than it is. However, after a week and a half of constant wear (I kept it on while washing hands, but took it off to shower, use hand sanitizer, wash dishes, etc), the gold plating has worn off to show a deeper copper color. (In my opinion, not as pretty as the original paler pink color, but also not horrifically ugly.) I know that plating wears off (my white gold jewelry turns yellow over time) and that jewelry reacts to the chemicals in your skin, but I didn't expect this to happen after only a week of wear!

I wore this along side a 10k rose gold band, and by the end of the week the color distortion was highly noticeable, especially in sunlight. On the flip side, at the end of the week, the 10k band had noticeable scratches, whereas this ring still looked brand new. (Well, besides the coloring.)

I think I may order the "white tungsten carbide" version and see if that holds up any better. Obviously the ring itself is of reasonable quality, so it may just be that whatever chemical is used in the rose gold plating doesn't work with my body chemistry.

Pictures, for color comparison. The one with three rings are (left to right) 18k white gold, this ring, 10k rose gold. The one with four rings are 18k white gold, 14k rose gold, this ring, 14k yellow gold. The one with two bands: this ring (bottom) and 10k rose gold (top); the two rings were worn for the exact same amount of time (received the one with diamonds for Christmas), together. You can see the color difference, but also how scratched up the 10k band is! Tungsten carbide for the win right there.
summary: Color changed after a week of wear.

I purchased these for my wife as a gift, so the final review won't come until I give them to her, but I can still give them a pretty good critiquing.
However, I honestly don't see much wrong with them.
-The crystals are of sufficient size to provide decent luster.
-They are arranged nicely and evenly.
-The metal hoop portion is very sturdy and well crafted.
-They pop open and snap shut in a way that doesn't feel flimsy or difficult.
-If I have one concern it might be that they are a little heavy, but I know for a fact that my wife has heavier earrings, so that should not be an issue.
-They do not come with a gift box of any kind, but that's ok, I can find a creative way to wrap these.

Amazon has these listed for $20 right now, and that seems like a fair price for this quality, especially when the name Swarovski is involved.

Disclaimer: I'm a terrible husband and I got my wife a gift at a discount in exchange for my honest review. I strive to review such products as if I had paid full price and as if I won't die unexpectedly if she ever found out.
summary: The crystals are a nice size and they shine well.

reviewText:
I have an addiction to sparkly earrings and these are no different. I found them on here and really liked the design.  I always have to be careful because some earrings will cause my lobe to swell, turn red, and itch. I decided I would order and give them a chance.
  I am a dental hygienist and generally I don't like to spend alot on earrings for work as I have a tendency for them to get lost while I'm working.  I take my mask on and off all day and sometimes the earrings get caught on my earloops and they get lost. I liked this design specifically for the fact that the post attaches to the rest of the earring and isn't just a post and back. This will lessen the chance of me getting it hooked on my mask and losing the earring.
  I really like the fact that these are really sparkly when you wear them and they appear to be well made and durable. I've been wearing them a few weeks and I still have not lost them so that is an awesome sign that I will have this set a while. In the time I have work these, I have had no redness, itching, or swelling of my ear lobes. They have not tarnished nor have they turned my skin green. They are just as shiny as the day I have received them in the mail.  It also helps that I have cleaned them in the jewelry cleaning chemicals and that hasn't damaged the earrings either.
  The earrings themselves are about 2cm in diameter and a half a cm in width. So they aren't humongous or gaudy, just classy. You can get them in three colors, gold, rose gold, and silver.  The pair I purchased were in silver and I'm going to get my sister a pair in rose gold since her favorite is in rose gold.  They make a great gift because they don't tarnish, don't turn the skin green, and she has sensitive ears as well and I feel confident enough that issues won't occur as I've been wearing them for weeks with no issues. If you don't like these earrings then they have a money back guarantee.  I did purchase these at a discount and this is my honest opinion that is not at all swayed by the fact I had a discount at checkout.
  In conclusion, I would recommend these for yourself or a gift as these are well made and durable, classy looking and not gaudy, clean up nicely, and I haven't had any issues with irritation.  Just a pretty pair of earrings that look good with any outfit and would make a great gift idea. Even at full price these are a good deal.
summary: Classy earrings that sparkle. Well made and didn't cause irritation to my sensitive ears.  I would recommend these earrings.

Before I begin. Note that this is a rather inexpensive item to purchase, and even with that, I am not able to look past the quality.
Cons: The paint is very poor. There are bubbles and orange peel.
As noted by others, the magnets are not very strong it will hold about 10 folded bills max.
The hinge point is too large (meaning there is a gap) that does not allow it to support the bills towards the center of the clip. Your bill will rotate around the center points of the magnets due to this.
With 10 bills in the clip, I loose the clip in my pocket if I am not able to grab the clip directly. This means, if you put your hand in your pocket and grab the bills only, there is a high chance that the clip will slide off while you are pulling the money out of your pocket.
This should not be sold as a money clip but instead as a shelf display item, etc.

Pros: I put in two nails with large heads in my wall. I was able to paint over the nails and put the clip on the wall where it looks pretty nice just suspended there with the rest of my batman memorabilia. Definitely not usable as a money clip.
summary: Spend the extra money and get a real money clip if you need a money clip.

reviewText: These are my new guilty pleasure.  They are lightweight for the summer, they aren't clingy or tight as some jeans made from spandex or Lycra can be, theres no muffin top or even mom jeans look with them.  I bought my normal pants size (I have a 27 or 28 inch waist depending on the day, just for sizing comparison), and the SMALL fit fine.  There is a little bit of wriggling involved to get them over your hips, at least for me, but once on they loosen up quickly and are incredibly comfortable.  The solution to the loosening up effect is the drawstring in the waistband.  It holds them up snugly, but I don't really need it.  I think it depends on your overall shape whether to size up or not; Im built like a boy, unfortunately, so theres no problem with the waist going over my hips.  I don't think Jennifer Lopez would be able to wear these well, but I highly doubt her jeans cost only $40.

These "jeans" would be 5 stars if it weren't for the very strong bleachy/mothball smell!! I've washed them twice, used in-wash "smell good" beads, and they still have a strong odor. If the smell doesn't go away with one more wash, I guess I'll send them back.
super soft and comfortable.

I love the drawstring. I LOVE the dark indigo (which they may have discontinued :-( ).

reviewText: Be aware that these will shrink over time. After a year mine have lost some length. I got them a size big, and they were already generous. These are drawstring too for people like me with a really small waist and really huge hips, it is a necessity.

These jeans are meant to sit way below the waistline which is not acceptable for me to wear this in the office. I have since noticed that the photos for all the "PamajaJeans" show them sitting well below the belly button. If this manufacturer would offer the same style with a longer rise, I would happily buy them.

I bought these in size large because of all of the reviews saying they run small. They kept falling down. I exchanged them for size medium. I wear about a 10 in regular jeans (sometimes closer to 12 if it's that time of the month). The medium fits alright and was comfy straight out of the package. They stretch after a day's wear, though. My boyfriend noted that they "don't hang like regular jeans" and that they were "saggy in the butt" after a full day's wear. I still like them, though, and they'll do you just fine if you're only wearing them for a few hours (or if you don't care about the saggy butt issue). Made it though the wash just fine, color held and they shrank in the dryer back to how they were when I got them. I really don't think anyone aside from my boyfriend has noticed that they're not actual jeans, and I don't think *he* would've noticed if I didn't tell him. He'd notice the saggy butt issue, though.  :)  WAY comfier than regular jeans, none of that pinching at the waist when sitting or binding in the knees if you tend to sit cross-legged or with one leg under you.

But like other reviewers,  the waist is a bit of a struggle to get over the hips the first time. I can't see a way around this for the manufacturer without compromising how comfortable they are. But like all jeans,  with a little wear,  loosen up a bit and become easier to pull up throughout the day. I wear a size 8 and ordered medium.  They fit perfectly.

This is my 4th pair of Pajama Jeans!  I took some heat from my co-workers and clients when I said I was going to order my first pair.  Well, now that I've worn them to the salon, clients are now ordering pajama jeans for themselves!  They're SO COMFORTABLE and I love them!

I like the fabric and style, but the sizing is very different than other jeans I buy. I'm usually an 8 or a 10 so I got "medium."  They are extremely snug, can barely get them up, and if they shrink at all, they wouldn't fit, so I reordered a "large," received today.  (I'm 5'8" and 145, slim hips.) Since these are boyfriend style and not supposed to be figure-hugging, I think the larger size is better and there is allowance for a little shrinkage.  The waist is very roomy, but the hidden drawstring takes care of that issue. I may replace it with elastic to make things easier.  I wish these came up a bit higher on the waist, but other than that, I like them.
UPDATE  Now that I've had the large size awhile, here are my thoughts. The rise in these jeans is too short, so it's good that the large comes up a little higher. I put elastic in the waist band tunnel so I wouldn't have to tie a drawstring. The large was really too roomy and baggy, so I took a few inches out of each leg, on the outer seam.  I'm sure the medium is really my size, but because of the low rise they didn't work. I like them a lot now, and have two (altered) pair which I wear all the time. To the Pajama Jeans company: Make these higher rise.  Make the mediums a tad bit larger. Do away with the "whiskering" look.  Make the waist a little smaller, and consider elastic. Then they would be close to perfect.

reviewText: I have owned three pairs of pajama jeans.  The first pair I purchased from a store when they first came out.  They were the original bootcut indigo.  They were very soft inside, stretchy, and warm.  I purchased a second pair of the same style (bootcut indigo) from Amazon and they are almost exactly like the original pajama jeans except they have added pink drawstring inside.  The third pair I purchased was the boyfriend stonewashed style.  The material of the boyfriend style pajama jeans is very different.  It is not soft on the inside.  It feels more like a thin, very stretchy jean.  However, I am not disappointed, they don't get as warm so I can wear these year round.  These jeans look fantastic, are extremely comfortable, and are a bit more stylish than the original style.  I even wore them with heels at work and got several compliments.  The cuff on the boyfriend jean is not sewn in place, so you can roll it down!!  I do recommend treating them like an expensive pair of jeans when you wash them.  Use cold water only and let them either air dry or dry on a very low cycle. I have not had any problems with sizing or shrinkage.  I am a curved size 14 and these are flattering.  If I could ask the pajama jean company to consider one change, I would recommend they make the back pockets bigger.  The back pockets are on the smaller side and as some of you may know, that is not the best look if you have a wide back side.
summary: Have loved these since they first came out!

I was really uncertain about the whole PajamaJean thing and couldn't decide if it was "yay awesome!" or "giving up on life". I did a bunch of internet research and generally found that people who actually tried out a pair of the jeans for the most part liked them. If they didn't like them it's because they didn't like the fit. People who overall didn't like the concept were making fun of the infomercials but hadn't actually tried the product. So I decided to give it a shot. I am pear shaped and put my weight in my hips and legs, so I went for the ONE non-skinny jean option they offered. As soon as my little package arrived, I pulled out my jeans, and I was amazed at how soft they were. I tried them on and they fit me perfectly. Things tend to be too narrow in the thigh for me, and any plus sized item is guaranteed to be way to big in the waist and the rise. I ordered the 1x based on my measurements and the size chart on the PajamaJeans website - 38" waist, 50" hips, expecting the waist to be a little big. The fit was as expected, nice and loose in the thigh area, they hug my butt without squeezing it, and I can cinch in the waist without it looking like a paper bag. I really like the waist cinch, it's a flat cord that when tied in a bow lies flat. The fabric is pretty thin so I don't see these working for colder climates unless you wear long underwear underneath. I really like the cropped length and the overall color is really fun.

But do they look like jeans? yes, for the most part, they do. If you look close you can see the texture of the knit fabric, but from any normal distance, it just looks like a normal jeans wash.

So why only four stars? Mainly the color. There is this striping in the pocket area that is really only flattering if you have no hip definition and trying to create some. If you, however, have hips, the last thing you want is to draw attention to them. I'm hoping this fades in time. It's not a deal breaker for me.

I only have 2 suggestions, 1) the inner cord should be elastic so I can take the jeans off without untying it, and 2) fix the striping on the hips so it's more flattering for wider hipped women.

Finally, I really wish they'd make more relaxed fit styles like this in a variety of washes. I just don't like wearing "fitted in the hip and thighs" types of jeans for my figure.

We all know from the other descriptions that the sizing is based on toothpick Asian standards (where this is made, though my suit was shipped directly from Amazon in a few days). So I got the largest size available, XXXL. The bottoms for very well. I did not hear stitches break as I put the suit on, like many others described (also others claimed there were skulls in place of some polka dots but that wasn't the case with mine either--all polka dots). But the bra part is a serious joke. I thought based on some of the other customers' pictures I could perhaps pull it off, but for sure my boobs would fall out of the bottom if I had the courage to wear it out (no way). I'd say the bra size is a C and anyone with a larger chest should either look elsewhere, or only buy it for the bottom. I considered shopping around for a different top but with my bra size probably the best I could do is a sports bra and that would ruin the look of the suit. I am totally comfortable wearing this bikini in public, even walking on the pool deck without a cover-up. It's got all the coverage of a one-piece - you see maybe four inches of my stomach between the bottoms and the top - but it's actually cute. I'm ordering the black one with skulls and dots (I bought the navy one with red dots) so I can have two. Ladies, if you are pear-shaped regardless of whether you're plus sized, this bikini should work for you.
summary: Great Plus-Size Bikini for the Price!

reviewText:
I really wanted this suit to work it is really cute and it feels well made. However, if you have large breasts (D cup and up) this will not work for you. Probably wouldn't work with small breasts (A-B cup) either because of the cup shape. Would work for someone in the C cup range or someone with breast implants. So you need to be large enough to fill it out but not too large that you need support. This top offers absolutely no support. The cups are formed foam but there is no underwire and the straps are not reinforced so they are stretchy. The cups have a good 2"-3" in between them so they are really far apart which makes your breasts fall out in the front.

  The bottoms I really liked. I am only 5'2" so they came up pretty high. There was only about 2" of space above. I have a small waste but large butt and hips so I ordered to fit the hips which made it a bit loose on the waste. There is ruched fabric on the front which can help flatter the stomach but none on the back. The bottoms are not reinforced so if you are looking for something to hold your stomach in this is not it. They are only made of lycra but are well made.
summary: Okay for the price. Top not supportive.

reviewText:
This review is regarding the style, overall fit, and material. I have a slender build (160 lb, 5"11) and often times have problems with tops being too wide at the base, giving off the unnecessary fabric "bulge". This zip was built slim and fit perfectly in that regard. The material is very soft and comfortable, definitely one you can wear for a long day. I found myself naturally reaching for pockets that are not there so that was a tad annoying but can easily adjust to. I've had troubles with the zip style in the past where the raised collar hits me in the chin whenever I look to the side. This jacket did not have that issue as the sides of the collar sit relatively flat.

I ended up having to return and exchange for a L as I have long arms and the sleeves were a tad too short. For non-gorilla armed men, this should fit wonderfully. I look forward to when the L arrives so I can add this piece to my collection. I will review the L once it arrives.

I really love this Lodis RFID Card Holder. I have one already I wanted to give my niece one has a gift. She fell in love with mine.

What with the new chip and pin cards, my previous Lodis wallet (in the same compact style) was no longer secure enough. I had tried a larger wallet but everything I fit into this wallet thickened the other one excessively, so when I found an RFID protected Lodis wallet I got this and I'm happy. The color is lovely, though the leather is much stiffer than my old one. All my cards fit. Money is still a little tight in the center pocket, just as with the old one, but it's still an enjoyable wallet to use. You can feel the stiffness of the protective mesh sewn into the lining of each card slot. My biggest complaint is that the snap button opens too easily whereas in my old wallet it held much firmer.

reviewText: I bought another product before this that was very good and made the entire family ecstatic but when we received this project it literally was an amazing and transforming experience. I'm not sure what happened but my daughter wasn't born colorblind but started seeing red as yellow and green and blue as gray in one eye then eventually in both eyes. In less than 2 weeks without the glasses, she now sees blue fine and for a few minutes after taking off the glasses she's still able to see all colors. My prayer is that her entire vision returns to what it used to be.
summary: Incredible transforming experience. One of the best items I've ever purchased!

reviewText: I had absolutely no problems with my order or delivery. I purchased the Enchroma glasses for my son. He is in his forties and can finally see colors. There were so many things he never noticed, that stand out in his vision now. Flowers, all the different shades of green in the grass, as well as all the different shades of color in trees. He was amazed when he saw his 2 daughters eyes. He had no idea they are very blue. Street lights are much more obvious now too. Playing Candy Crush is so much easier now as well. It would have been great if he had the glasses when he was a child. Everything for children is about color. Fortunately, he has them now.
summary: He was amazed when he saw his 2 daughters eyes

reviewText: My husband doesn't notice much of a difference in color with the glasses.  He says they make the colors slightly more distinctive but wouldn't necessarily recommend them especially for the price.  Definitely not life changing for him
summary: Glass aren't all they are cracked up to be

reviewText:
These glasses are a miracle! I gave them to my husband on Saturday and he can see color for the first time ever. He is absolutely amazed at the beauty of the world. He now knows what he was missing. He loves them!
To anyone who is colorblind, these glasses are a must if you can do it.
Made a Huge difference in color vision!

Due to my engineering background I'm pretty skeptical about outlandish product claims. But today I tried Enchroma glasses and they really work.

I am red green color blind. This has been the source of many arguments between me and my wife. And I have the wardrobe to prove it.

Anyway, my wife gave me a pair of Enchroma glasses today. I tried them this afternoon. I am utterly amazed at how different the world looks through them.

Red's are so much brighter. Roses seem to glow. A flower that looked deep blue without the glasses is deep purple with them. I spotted a golfer wearing a bright red shirt on the course that I would not have seen before unless they were moving. This is unbelievable.

I still don't know if I really believe that others see the world so much more vividly than I do. After all, color perception is only an agreement between humans, we don't truly know what anyone else actually sees.

But with these glasses the world is a much more beautiful place.
My son can now see colors!

Amazing! What a great experience watching our son see color for the first time.
Worth every penny
Love them
They did not work for us at all.
They did not work. We will return them

Unfortunately it didn't work for the person we bought it for.  I don't believe his colorblindness was as bad as other people who have had success with these glasses.
That being said, the frames are well made and looked good on the individual.

Enchroma expects their expensive glasses to last 2-4 years with regular use. If you think that's normal then go for it. My frames started falling off my face after a year or so of use to the point they became more annoying to wear than not. When I wrote them to mention that fact they essentially said buy a new pair. So if you want to buy a new pair of $350 glasses every two years, these are the one for you.

I'm afraid they did not work for my boyfriend. He has the type of colorblindness that these are made for but his case must be too severe. The directions say to keep trying to wear them for up to two weeks for your eyes to adjust but after just a few minutes, he got a headache and was nauseous. He kept them on for another half hour but didn't see any difference other than what he always sees when he has on sunglasses. No red or green, purple or orange. They did arrive in good condition and promptly. Just wanted others to be warned not to get your hopes up too much.
summary: They did arrive in good condition and promptly

reviewText: Purchased for a 12 year old girl and she really likes it. It may be the most modest swimsuit I have found that is also fashionable.

I bought this suit to wear in our backyard pool. I wanted something modest, that would stay modest while playing with my active 9 year old. I loved the budget friendly price and reviews said the fabric and construction were quality, so I went for it. I fall between 2 sizes on the chart and because one of the reviews said it was tight in the chest, I went for the larger size. When I got it and took it out of the package, I was indeed pleased with the fabric and construction. The bra part even has pockets with removable pads.  When I tried it on, I was excited about the comfortable fit, the lack of any binding or pinching, the overall look is flattering. For the first time since I was a little girl, I felt completely comfortable and confident in a swimsuit.

I had to wait nearly a week until I could try it in the pool, but I've worn it twice now and I absolutely love it! The zipper continues to work smoothly when it's wet, too. I plan to buy another one, or maybe two.

If there were any cons it would be that if you have to put it back on while it's still wet, it can be hard to get situated, but not really any more so than your average one piece.

Despite the unflattering photos of the model shown, when sized to be form fitting, this suit actually looks nice.  I was expecting a very, very thin fabric, but it's a good weight (when form fitted, provides some light shaping) and fully opaque.  The leg length reaches mid thigh on me, which is exactly what I needed.  I can't speak to how this suit performs in the water/weather yet, but I'm pleasantly surprised at the quality and fit.

**I paid REGULAR LIST PRICE for this item and am writing this review without incentive**
Great suit, modest in appearance, hides problem areas and great material well made

reviewText:
This is very beautiful handmade 3 piece amuse set. the point of the pin concentrates the negative energy and does not allow it to impact the person who wears it. The pin is pinned to babys cradle upward with its edge in order to protect him against the evil eye.
I receive this product on a discount or free for reviewing purposes

Unlike most of the current reviews rating these highly, I actually have a baby and actually put the two baby bracelets on him while I supervised. I admit, the beaded bracelet especially looks very nice, and I was excited for my son to wear it. However, the beaded baby bracelet does not adjust at all. He was able to pull it off almost instantly...and of course it went straight to his mouth. Huge HUGE choking hazard. If I wouldn't have been in the immediate area, I'm sure he would have almost swallowed this. The plain red string bracelet is adjustable. My son immediately pulled at this one, too, even though I was able to tighten it to be slightly snug against his wrist. He started to pull so hard at it, I could see it was cutting off circulation. I'm normally pretty "low key" about baby stuff. Kids will be kids...but these really shouldn't be used on an infant. I'm giving this two stars, only because the pin could be a cute accessory on a handbag.
summary: The baby bracelets are really unsafe, in my opinion.

reviewText:
This is very beautiful handmade 3 piece amuse set. I had to actually look it up, because I didn't believe my grandma, she speaks the truth. I found out and confirmed thru the internet that these were actually worn to ward off evil. Wow...was all I could say. This particular pin, the point of the pin concentrates the negative energy and does not allow it to impact the person who wears it. The pin is pinned to babys cradle upward with its edge in order to protect him against the evil eye. But several people know how to use the power of this protective charm correctly and when used correctly it protects against evil eye and curses. This gorgeous pin layered in yellow gold, and accented around the opening end is diamond like stones that just covers the closing part. This set is breath taking knowing the history, it also contained 3 beautiful red bracelets, one has a blue eye to ward off evil, the other two are made of  with knots which are meant for fate and fortune! These are adjustable with a little tug, which you can put on your little ones wrist or ankle. Just be careful when leaving them unsupervised. This is going to make a beautiful gift for my daughter n law who is expecting their second child in May. I would recommend this as a gift for anyone. I received this product at a discounted price or the item was supplied to me in exchange for the purposes of a product review. All opinions are 100% my own and they reflect my honest & unbiased opinion.

reviewText: This is a really cute gift set for a baby or a baby's Mom.  It is supposed to bring good luck and protection, and as such is probably more appropriate to gift to those Moms who put any stock into that.  The bracelets are pretty small, and I am not sure if an adult could wear them.  I personally also would not put them on a baby's hand, but only because I am over protective and worry about things getting too tight.  Please let my opinion not be an indicator or an implication as to the safety of this product.  That said, I could see myself gifting it to the Mom who has expressed an interest in items such as this.  It is well made, colorful and comes in a cute gift box.  I was able to get a great price on it so I could review it, and have enjoyed doing so.
I absolutely LOVE this! It came with the three bracelets and the pin with charms. Packages so nicely and all just beautiful!

It wouldn't close by any means because of the thickness of the case. But if you only have small watches don't worry about it though.

These socks are amazing! I am so thrilled with them - great colors, great quality, fun to wear, and I really liked how they were packaged. I've been mixing/matching them and getting many compliments. Love this product, highly recommend. It's great that they come in several different sizes, too. I ordered the 9-11 for my size 11.5 feet, and they fit perfectly.

They fall a little, and are just a little on the short side, but overall I like these socks.  Unfortunately, I think the biggest flaw is that you get three pair of the very same style and color scheme for the price.  Would be nice to vary it up a bit. The only real reason I gave it 4 stars is because of the lack of variance in the three pair pack.

The socks arrived fast. They came with a little tape measure in both inches and centimeters. They are going overseas, so the tape measure is just right. The company then emailed a users' manual for care of the socks. Amazing! The socks feel soft and the colors are cheerful.

I had to get these because I loved both of the three-color combinations - too cute! As another reviewer noted, these are on the the thin side, but that's what I prefer with my everyday desert boots. And these nubby-textured socks shouldn't always be hidden in boots - I also like to wear them with loafers and driving mocs. They're soft, and don't take forever to dry - nice! I'd like to see the three-color theme in some other combinations - I'm sure I'd buy those too!
summary: A bit of fun for your feet!

reviewText:
Excellent customer service BEFORE I asked a question. Socks looked small so I was intent upon sending them to my granddaughter, thinking they would not fit me. I have a problem with tight socks AND shoes.  Customer service sent me a pre-emptive email letting me know more about the cotton crew socks, and that they would stretch and be comfortable.  I was skeptical, but tried on a pair. W/O their initial email I never would not have tried them on and they ARE comfortable!

Not only did they actually FIT, they do not hurt my feet or make my ankles swell.  That is a first for me in many many years. Comfortable! These are not winter socks. They are not warm, but comfy so would recommend you buy them for Spring/Summer when it is warmer. She said for me to put on two pair and they should fit fine and be warm, so might try it.

They answered all my questions and with the super good service and comfortable socks, it all gave rise to me purchasing MORE socks!  I ordered the striped cony hair socks. Cony you ask?  Rabbit hair. Hare. :o)  Hope they are as comfortable and also are warm!

Great product, beautifully packaged! Would make a great holiday gift because it comes elegantly packaged in small but sturdy box! Completely love these socks!Vero Monte Women's Colorful Cotton Crew Socks.

The color in these socks are beautiful and the material very soft. I had bought these as a Christmas Gift for my daughter and I can't wait for my daughter to receive them. Even the box they came delivered in was attractive and makes me feel even more proud to wrap them in christmas paper and give as a lovely gift. Who would ever thought giving socks would be lovely as a Christmas gift. However the colors and quality of these socks are truly a gift worth giving. I was even contacted by the seller giving me detailed instructions on how to care for them. I love the customer service I receive in making my purchases on  Amazon. I want to buy myself some. : )

I love these socks.  I purchased them for my daughters and myself and we have been very happy with them.  The socks are a great weight and yet warm.  Yet my feet do not get hot and sweaty. They fit beautifully and are not too tight on my ankles or legs at the end of the day as some socks are. I will definitely purchase more in the future. And....they are really cute.  The colors are great and they make my feet happy as well. Comfort and cuteness....can't beat that!  THanks Vero Monte for these great socks.
summary: So Happy I came upon these great socks

reviewText: I love these socks!  I now have several pairs and don't wear any other socks.  I live in Houston and they're perfect for the climate; they're super soft and comfy.  I've given them as gifts and people always love them!  Treat yourself to a pair; you won't regret it!

These are the best socks ever!  They came in a beautiful box/great for gift giving.  They are very comfortable and came out of the dryer looking like brand new.  They did not bind nor slide down.  I loved the colors and will be ordering more.

These socks are wonderful! They are so warm and stay put, and I love the blend of colors!
Vero Monte has excellent quality products, and their customer service is absolutely amazing. I highly recommend this brand!!

These socks are fabulous! The colors are beautiful and go with everything. They are very pretty and comfortable. They are not too thick or thin ,but are a nice year round weight. These are a second set i have of these socks,when you wash them the colors stay bright ,but they get softer. They are excellent socks,I love them and would definitely recommend them,they would make a great gift !They come nicely packed in their own little box.

These socks are great. The fit is correct. They are soft and warm.  The colors are wonderful. They don't slide down like so many others do. I have many socks from Vero Monte and always have been very pleased with their socks. Their customer service and follow up is excellent.
Thank you Vero Monte for a wonderful product,
These are great socks!  They are soft, comfortable and warm without being bulky!

I LOVE these socks. The weight of these socks is perfect!!  Excellent durability, beautiful colors.  I have purchased them for myself and the box is so nice that they come in, I have also purchase them as gifts.
These are great socks! Fit well, comfortable, and very colorful. I especially like the teal and purple ones. I'm a Charlotte Hornets fan! :)

I love these new socks...so warm, cotton-based and fit perfect and also have some stretch.  They are pretty and the weaving is beautiful, and the quality of the materials are great.  They are a sock that has sentimental traditional qualities of days gone by, when things were warm, cotton and well-made and so perfect in a boot or a winter shoe.  I wear them with my UGGS and with my fall-winter shoes.  They have that "slice-of-Americana" touch.  Absolutely love'em and HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM !!
I received these socks as a gift.  I absolutely LOVE them, they don't slide down and do not cut off circulation either.  Perfect winter/boots.
summary: I absolutely LOVE them, they don't slide down and do not ...

reviewText: These socks are not only very cute but also very cozy! They keep my feet dry and warm even on very rainy and cold days. I really enjoy the great colors and very soft material. I almost don't need slippers walking around the house.

I really enjoy Vero Monte socks and hosiery. These socks are very soft and are not overly thin or thick. These socks are just a tad larger than average but I think this makes them more comfortable. I wear boots and these don't bunch up or slouch.
summary: Yet more great socks from Vero Monte

reviewText: These arrived today and I couldn't be happier! Beautifully packaged, they're a pleasure to open and look at - and once I put the them on I found out they were also super comfortable. Neither too thick nor too thin, they're going to be perfect year-round. Thank you Vero Monte!

Buyer beware!!! The sock pictured on Amazon is good for exactly one wearing. After one washing the socks shrink to pretty much an ankle length sock. I had wanted a sock that extended up my calf. Not so these socks.

These are very comfy and VERY PRETTY socks! The colors and design are both really nice. These stay in place on my foot (no sagging) and they washed well. I wear a size 9 and these fit great. I thought these were so pretty that I showed them to friends. The packaging is so cute! These arrived fast. I'll probably buy additional pairs soon. I'm very pleased with this purchase!
These socks are super cute and so comfy. These are definitely now my favorite socks!

These socks are adorable! These are the  " just the right stockings" as they are not too thin nor too thick. The colors are sophisticated and soft--perfect for anytime wear-at home or the office. They are really fun to wear and just make your feet look happy! I am very pleased with this product and also, with the customer service provided by VERO MONTE. I am buying several for Christmas gifts for family and friends. Great value!

As a customer of Vero Monte, I received a gift from the company thanking me for being a valued customer. I had never tried these socks before (i have bought and love their no-show socks), and these socks are fantastic. They feel good because the cotton is very soft and they hug my feet and ankles. The bright and happy colors look great peeking out the top of my LL Bean boots. I like the medium thickness of these socks because they will be comfy in all four seasons. Thank you, Vero Monte! I highly recommend these socks.
These socks are adorable and very comfortable. I will enjoy wearing them!
These socks are absolutely beautiful, comfortable and warm. I've worn them only a few times and I love them so far. The colors are wonderful.
These are fun socks.  I get lots of compliments.  I wear a size 11 and the socks have plenty of room.

After buying the fishnet anklets from this company  and before I go on, let me say the fishnets are on trend, a great value and super comfy  I came across these Vero Monte crew socks. This company has a magic wand, because the socks are ridiculously comfortable, a great value, on trend and unlike any other socks on the market. I used to think socks are socks, and you either bought them as a fashion statement or a necessity. Vero Monte proves otherwise by producing socks that are fashionably comfortable.
summary: MUST HAVES for fashion and comfort

reviewText:
These socks just won't stay up. Other people reported that they didn't slouch, but I must have gotten a bad bunch. They are pretty useless to me if they won't even stay up.

These socks may not have been great for me, but Vero Monte customer service is excellent. The purple/blue socks are gorgeous, I wanted to love them, but, alas, my luck was not good with these socks. But I came back to amend my review to tell folks that I got excellent response from customer service.
summary: Slouchy, slouchy, slouchy. Useless (but great customer service response)

reviewText: These are cute and comfortable.  Very soft and while a little large, they will become my go to socks on a cold winter's evening.  I will order a smaller size next time, and I will be ordering again.  These are just great socks all around.

This is one of the most ethical companies I've worked with on Amazon.  I don't write many reviews but when vendors are responsive to their customers, are eager to please and offer a QUALITY, well fitting and attractive product, I believe that I must share my positive experience with others.  I just love these socks and have made several purchases in the past year or so.  They appeal to young and old alike, are comfortable and wash and wear very well.  There isn't enough that I can say about this company, their representatives and their wonderful socks!  You won't be sorry.

Vero Monte are beautiful, well made socks.  It is difficult to choose a pattern and color.  It will be fun shopping for more Vero Monte socks in the future.  The price is amazingly reasonable and the customer service is quick and helpful,  I was sent a post purchase e mail explaining the socks get better with proper washing.
Hi, I have gotten the socks, have started using them, they are very lovely, comfortable, and warm.

I received these socks as a gift from the company because I'd made a prior purchase (which I am also very happy with). I was not paid to write a review, however, and am writing this because I honestly think these are great socks -- beautiful to look at and really comfortable.  I think they look better "in person" than  in the photo, because then you can see the subtle variation in color that gives the socks such a nice texture.  They are a  nice weight -- feel substantial but thin enough to not be bulky under shoes.  I haven't worn them long enough to be certain, but they seem like they will wear well.  They came packaged in a nice box with each pair of socks rolled beautifully to show off their colors.  I think they make a wonderful gift.

These socks fit and feel great.  The marled (sp?) is really pretty and they have the appearance of a much thicker sock without interrupting the fit of your shoes.  They fit just below the start of the calf and are great for wearing with boots or other loafer type shoes.  They're also beautifully packaged.  Buy with confidence!

First of all, these came in the most adorable packaging and the presentation blew me away. But these socks are perfect! Surprisingly they don't slide down at all. I run in them frequently and they haven't worn at all and are very warm. But most importantly they are breathable. They almost look homemade which makes them adorable but you can certaintly tell they are high quality. I would recommend to anyone :)
summary: these came in the most adorable packaging and the presentation blew me away

A lot of socks make my feet sweat. Not these. They are perfect. Form fitting at the toes and heels without bunching up inside my shoes (I hate that!) I'm also enjoying how colorful and fun they are too. I do hope they start making them in more colors.
Great multi-colored socks with a better than average fit that hold up well after washing and drying. Couldn't ask for anything better!

They fit snugly (which I love!) but I've been assured they won't shrink and can be stretched to size after washing and machine drying. I haven't washed them yet, but Vero Monte has amazing customer service so I'm not worried. I'm so glad I found this sock company!

reviewText:
These feel so nice on my feet and they're a bit funky and fun.  They fit my 10.5 size foot very well and seem true to size.  The colors portrayed on Amazon are accurate.  I immediately put my on to try out the size to make sure I was going to keep them and then didn't want to take them off.  I don't yet know how they wash.  Alas, I have big ankles -- some swelling and so far they are staying up and keeping my ankles warm, but without being binding.  Some socks are extremely tight and uncomfortable.  I hope they hold up well.

I saw someone mention the packaging --- they're right!  The packaging is awesome.  Makes you feel like you spent a ton of money on these socks -- actually I went and double checked.  Each pair in rolled with a tasteful brand ribbon around them, and then all in a really nice box.  I'm not into keeping boxes, but I want to re-purpose this box as it's heavy duty and just well made.  It's silly but I was a tad excited like a little kid opening the box, as it felt like I had given myself a really nice gift.

I would buy this brand again for myself and for friends & family as a gift.

These socks are great. The color is cheerful, the content mix of cotton and polyester/spandex seems to work well, and they fit just as well after washing. (I dried them in the dryer for a short time and then hung them up.)

These Women's Colorful Patterned Soft Cotton Crew Socks are the most comfortable socks I have EVER worn!  Not too tight....not too lose....amazingly comfortable, and so fun, with funky, great colors!!!  I love both the color combinations in which they come.  They are a fabric weight that fit into my comfy shoes just right.  They "breath" well, being cotton.  They do not stretch out, and keep their shape well.  The size 9-11 fit my size 10 shoe foot perfectly.  I cannot say enough good about these socks. They meet my expectations above and beyond!  I am one happy customer!  I am now...forever a fan of the Vero Monte Company and their INCREDIBLE products and customer service!!!
summary: Love Everything about Vero Monte and their products!!!

reviewText: Another winner from Vero Monte. Excellent product, fit, feel and quality. Just the right thickness and softness. I have found that they wash up and dry very well. No shrinkage or fading. I really enjoy wearing these, they are cool and comfortable.

The Vero Monte Women's Colorful Pattered Soft Cotton socks are simply lovely.  I not only love the colors, but the material lives up to its name.  I have spent many hours searching for cotton socks and these socks are the only socks that not only feel great but also look beautiful.  Now that it is fall, I have already worn them and have received many compliments.  I have washed them in my machine and have had no problems with any shrinkage or change in shape.  Needless to say, I am "over the moon" with my new socks.  In fact, yesterday, I purchased additional Vero Monte socks.  I am a happy customer and have confidence in both the product and its company.  I always feel happy with the small things in life and the socks have achieved that goal.  Thank you very much.  With gratitude, Sunshine

Not only are these socks cute, but they fit perfectly.  I wear a size 9.5 shoe and have a problem finding socks that fit.  I purchased the larger size.  Have worn them several times and have put them in the washer and dryer.  Both on the cooler settings.  They did not shrink.
I plan on purchasing more in the future.  Would recommend them to all my friends.
I really like these socks. They feel nice, they are fun and happy to wear. I bought some several months ago, and like them so well I bought more.

Customer service is very nice - around when I received them, I got a note from the company about taking care of the product and not to hesitate to let them know if I had any problems.

My kids love these! I bought them for trip to Disneyland and after reading so many reviews about the poor quality I almost didn't buy them. It seems like a lot of money for something so cheap, but I haven't had any problems with them. I was worried they'd fall apart before our trip and didn't give them to my girls until we were leaving. They lasted through a long car trip, several days at the park, and the months of play time since we've been back. They look darling on my girls and were perfect for our trip. Personally, I like them better than the puffy ones you buy at the park.

They're around 8 years old, and they like fun little things, and I thought this would be something they all could treasure and feel all grown up about. I was not disappointed with this product. The chain is light but sturdy and it has a good latch on it. The stone is set in tightly, and the heart really does sparkle more than it looks like in the photo. reviewText: Not too happy..cheap material..probably would cost more to send back than what I paid. :(
What was I thinking?  Buy a cheap hat and look like you're wearing a cheap hat
This is a costume hat. If you're going to dress as Freddy Krueger or Dr. Who #4 Tom Baker, it will work for a night.

I ordered this hat as part of a Halloween costume, which is good because it was mailed in a bag with no protection at all.  It arrived with the bag torn and the hat crushed and bent.  The material is easily reshaped, but the dents in the top portion in the hat will never completely come out right.  Also, the hat is small for me, and most "one size fits all" hats normally fit me just fine.  Also, the hat is not "floppy" as it is described.  The material is fairly stiff.  The hat does look good and in its somewhat beat up condition, it is perfect for my costume.  But if you are looking for a fashion hat to wear,  this hat probably wouldn't work for you since it isn't mailed in a box to protect it.  I imagine that every hat that they send out arrives in a similar state as mine did.  If you are looking for a good looking hat to go with your costume, and don't mind that it arrives flattened, this is a good deal.  The hat look good and the price is right.

*Update: I received an email from Elenker shortly after posting this review.  They apologized for the crushed condition my hat arrived in and offered me a full refund as well as saying that they would recommend a change on how this hat is packaged for mailing.  I declined the refund since I do intend to use this hat as part of my Halloween costume and I wouldn't feel right taking a refund on a product that I am using. However, the fact that Elenker contacted me right away and offered a refund is a big plus for me, so I am bumping this hat up one star because the company is responsive to their customers needs.  Thank you Elenker.
summary: Looks Good, But Packaging is Lacking

This is a very pretty charm. It is not an authentic Pandora friend charm but comes at a fraction of the cost. It does have very good workmanship and you would be hard-pressed to tell the difference just from looking at it on a bracelet.

Most Pandora brand Charms have a threaded Center hole that will not allow them to go past the spacers on the bracelet. The hole in this one is larger and it will slide over them. If you have a certain organization to your bracelet or just want to keep them from falling off the end you will need a spacer or at least cap the end with an official charm.

reviewText: Beautiful shoes. My one complaint is that they scuff fairly easily, but I bought some Dr. Marten's Wonder Balsam with these and it definitely helps to protect the leather, I would recommend using it or your favorite clear shoe polish to keep these babies safe. I get lots of compliments, and they're really quite sturdy, I'd bet they'll last me for quite a few years.

If you plan on using these, buy some medical grade antimicrobial soap AND green soap tincture. I don't advise using acrylic but I used these from size 8g to 00g and haven't had a single problem but I also create a steril environment and soak the tapers/plugs and o-rings in a hot water/soap mix then scrub with green soap soaked cheese cloth and then a final rinse with fresh water/soap mix followed by a very good quality lubricant for ears and tapers. Some people have adverse reactions to acrylic (infection, rash, unusual swelling/skin tries to graft onto acrylic) but I never had a problem so it really depends on the person. If you can try to get metal or glass which most shops will autoclave for free (or at the very least a very low price like 5-10 dollars) but if you're familiar with acrylic and just want a decent kit this one will do the job. If you plan on going bigger than 00g I'd recommend metal or glass since your ears will be more susceptible to infection (00g is the biggest size offered in this kit). Be careful and patient. Namaste.
summary: Im happy with mine but do your research and talk to a professional piercer before actually using these acrylic tapers/plugs

reviewText: Fast shipping.  Wife loves the watch.

I am not a big watch wearer but I think it may be because I haven't found the right watch. So I was offered this women's watch for a great deal to try and share my honest opinion about it. When it arrived, I put it on and absolutely love it!! Not only is it beautiful, but it is comfortable as well. I was going to give it to my mom or sister but have decided to keep it for myself. I definitely recommend this women's watch.
This watch is hypo-allergic a big plis to anyone allergic to nickle.  It is stylish and a big bonus is the tool included for removing links from the band, I am very pleased with this watch.
Beautiful watch!!!

This watch is GREAT! Mine came in a gift box and also came with a tool that I used to removed some of the links. The watch is wrapped entirely in some sort of clear wrapper so it had no scuffs or dings. If you are gifting this item, you may want to removed that ahead of time (otherwise, it may look a bit cheaper in quality than it likely is). I haven't heard of this company before but, for me, that didn't matter. The face of the watch is just so pretty and elegant. The minute hand is elongated and delicate looking. It's a snap to change the time and date on this watch AND I was able to remove my own links in about 10 minutes (6 minutes were watching a YouTube video for instructions). I would compare this watch, so far, to more expensive Swiss movement watches, even though I suspect this is Japanese quartz movements.
Oh, and while I did pay for this watch, I received the item at a discount in exchange for a review. That said, I would still purchase this watch at the full Amazon price, for sure.
summary: This is a GREAT watch at a GREAT price!

reviewText:
This is a beautiful watch and comes packaged like a designer watch in a gift bag in nice box on a pillow.  It is sleek, simple and elegant.  It comes with the tool to take out links so, I had my husband take a couple out for me.  Now it fits perfectly and can be worn with a casual outfit or dressed up.  I really like the Fold-over-clasp-with-hidden-double-push-button.  It is easy to put on and take off with one hand.  It is easy to set the time and the date.  Stainless steel so it will last and not irritate your skin.  Beautiful watch and a great value.
Sample provided for testing and review.

First of all, this is packaged very nicely and includes not only a substantial gift box but a really nice gift bag. It's a sleek stainless steel women's watch.  It has almost an androgynous look so could really work for either a man or a woman, but I really like it. Discounted sample provided for review.

It's a basic, classic watch, but looks beautiful and works great.

BUREI is a newcomer to retail sales here in the US. Manufactured in China, the materials and workmanship are really fine and honestly, though it took me quite a lot of searching to determine the place of actual manufacture, I was surprised. Products from China often are purchased with an expectation of sub-par manufacture. Not so here. The BUREI watches I have examined, including this really nice and basic Women's Analog Display Classic Dress watch, have done a nice job of demolishing that expectation - especially when it applied to BUREI watches.

This watch is neither clunky/heavy nor dainty/light - it is what most would regard as a 'normal' sized woman's watch with a ling bracelet. It is basic silver-tone, is easy to read and the date window (at 6 o'clock The bracelet links can be removed if the band is too big and BUREI even supplies the tool (and instructions for using it) to allow one to adjust the band length at home. I'm afraid I didn't trust the steadiness of my own hands to use this so for a few dollars, a local jeweler adjusted the band to the desired length. For the more confident, self-adjustment is probably a reasonable thing here!

THe analog dial is easy to read as is the day-of-the-month window located at 6 o'clock.

Nothing fancy, but sensibly attractive. No lewelsed band nor precious stone inlay - but a good-looking, reliable lady's wrist watch.
Nice job, BUREI!
summary: Nice job, BUREI! Sensibly attractive and reliable.

Love this ring! Very unique looking and get lots of compliments.

Lost my first $20 wedding band (Tungsten) and wanted the wood grain look this time around. Overall, I've been very satisfied with the ring and the sizing was spot on. Some things to point out, though. First off, I wanted beveled sides and this delivered. Another reason I chose this over other black tungsten rings, was because apparently black is ceramic's natural color, whereas black tungsten is black metal injected into it to make it black. It has a higher probability of showing wear and scratches because it's no it's natural color and  I'd have to say I like the natural gunmetal black color much better than just plain black.

Something that might throw some off, though, is the shininess of the ring. I half expected the wood part to be more of a semi gloss finish, but this ring shines all the way around. In the sunlight, the wood grain looks the best and really stands out and has a neat color to it; however, in lower light or indoor light, it's much harder to really see the wood grain style through the shininess of the ring. I don't mind it, but you might.

One last thing, this is my first experience with ceramic rings as my last was tungsten. I really got used to the weightiness of the tungsten and made me feel a little better knowing it was a heavier piece of metal. This ring is complete opposite in weight compared to my tungsten. Feels like a feather. It's something I grew accustomed to very quickly, but did not like at first. Ceramic is still almost as tough as tungsten, but if you like a weighted feeling ring, I don't suggest ceramic.

All in all, you're not spending that much on the ring so, if you've got a problem with it, there's a million other rings out there. I couldn't have asked for much more. I love it cause it suits my personality and my wife loves it, too. That's what really counts, anyway, right?!

reviewText: These tank tops fit somewhat small.

If I decide I want them under a sleeved shirt with jeans I'll buy a pack in a size up and they'll be fine. They were shipped lightning quick, and you can't beat the price. They are also tagless which is a huge plus as I despise tags scratching at the back of my neck.

This set is great.  I was initially turned off by the recommendation on the tag that they not go in the dryer, but another reviewer here tried it and found it only shrunk the length a little.  I tried this with my least favorite color and found the same.  They are quite long right out of the package, and they shrink 1-2 inches, but still long enough that I am not worried it will ride up and show my belly.  I then washed them all and everything is good.  Subsequent washings did not shrink them further.
summary: Great set, and they can go in the dryer!

reviewText: I'm 5'2" and yo-yo between 140 and 150lbs. I bought these to bum around the house, and for that, they're great. They're also good undershirts. I wouldn't be comfortable wearing alone in public, but that's my own hangup and not the top's fault.

These arrived yesterday and they are awful! The large size would barely fit a child. I couldn't even get them over my head. The fabric is so thin and cheap you can see through them. Fortunately the seller has refunded my money. Don't waste your time with these.
They aren't full back, they are raceback
The length Is shorter than i expected, i am 5'5 and would have loved for it to go past my waist. But other than that beautiful colors..
I needed some basic tanks to wear to bed and under see-through shirts.  These fit the bill.

This pack is an excellent value! I am happy with every single one of them. It is a great variety of colors and they fit great. I ordered the Large and I am normally a Large in shirts or a 10-12 kind of size in clothing. I was not sure about these at first but I was so pleased when they arrived. I am the kind of person who likes to wear a tank top under everything so this large variety of colors is so fun for me. These are also a good length so if you have a longer torso they will still work. I like to have my shirts come down a little to my hips and these are perfect. Couldn't be happier. I have received this product without charge to write an honest review, I have received no instruction and the opinions expressed are my own

I bought these tank tops for my pre-teen daughter to wear seeing that the weather was getting warmer. When it came, we opened the package and was so amazed at the 12  bright and beautiful colors. The fabric to my surprise was very stretchy and soft. She tried them on immediately, and loved them. The fit was very comfortable and the material is not too thin or too thick. Perfect for layering or wearing as is. At first I was worried about them being too small, but decided to order a size large, which I'm glad I did, because I tried one on and let me tell you the fit is great especially for being on the busty side. I have a habit of washing my clothes before wearing and have to say that these tops did not bleed or lose its stretch even after drying.  I will be ordering some for myself. These tops are worth the buy but just remember to order a size up. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

Ready for summer?  Well with this pack you can't go wrong.  You get 12 beautiful bright summer colors.  All the colors are perfect to layer on a hot summer day.  The tank tops are made of 100% cotton.  The fit is good to size. Tanks feel soft and comfortable to wear.  Just need to remember to line dry or they could shrink. I haven't had a problem.  I purchased these tank tops at a discount in return for my honest opinion and  review.

I was super excited for a 12 pack of tank tops. When I find a shirt I like I always buy it in every single color. I was a bit disappointed that they were too tight on me. I ordered my size but I couldn't wear them in public because they're too tight. They are a bit on the short side too. I'm only 5'4 but when I lifted my arms my stomach was showing. I will wear them around the house, to bed, and to workout though. They're very lightweight so they are perfect for me to workout in. They're really comfortable and the colors are vibrant. So I do suggest you order a size up! These will just be incentive for me to lose weight because I seriously love them still. *promotional pricing received for testing and review*

I really liked these tank tops because they are so versatile and you can wear them with anything! They are very soft and cozy, but not see through which is nice! They are also very vibrant, they pack came with a lot of different colors but they were like four different shades of blue tanks in the pack. This only downside is that they are kinda short but I would definitely buy this again!
I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest review all of my opinions are my own.

Great bright colors and well made! Super soft and fit great, but they're a little short for me. I'm 5'2" and recieved these at a discounted price for ny honest and unbiased review and opinion. I ordered a size bigger (medium) and should have gone larger :( but they will fit my 8 year old daughter perfectly!

I tried layering with these (hoping I could get some use out of them) but they were so bulky and thick, it was terrible. Plus, I kept pulling on the bottom of it, trying to get comfortable. The only positives to these is they probably last a while (even if you actually end up wearing them) because they seem to be well made and I really liked the colors.
