reviewText: I was so happy to receive these tank tops. The fit of the tank tops are true to size. I wear a size 7-8 and I ordered the medium size. The fabric is comfortably thin and stretchy. Most of the 11 tanks tops I got was laveled 100% cotton. Just rge gray tank had a label that states the fabric is made of 88% cotton and 12% polyester and that it is not 100% cotton as advertised. I just love all the colors which are vibrant and fun. They are so light weight, it feels like you're not wearing anything on at all. So cool! I will most certainly buy more in the future.
summary: A 12 set of tank tops for a great price.

reviewText: I bought the 12 pack, sized medium.  I'm about 5'1, with a large chest, and they fit me.  Note that these sizes are pre-shrunk, so they WILL shrink in the dryer.  I hand mine out to dry for that reason.  The material is good and stretchy, and they should last me a long time.  The colors were nice, I use them to workout in.  I would buy them again!

This is the absolute best deal on amazon!  I like them so much I have ordered another dozen.  They are soft, made well, not flimsy, great colors, and fit well, and the price!!!.  I have not washed them yet but I'm sure to wash in cold water and dry on low or air just to make sure I don't shrink them into a tube top!
summary: great deal and great product - thanks!!!

What an amazing deal! I don't know about you, but when I'm shopping online I'm looking for items and deals that I'll never find in a store. THIS definitely fits into that category. This 12 pack of assorted colored tank tops packs a serious punch!

The tank tops shipped out to me very quickly, and arrived in perfect condition. They were safely packaged in plastic, and weren't damaged at all during shipment. I was immediately impressed by how bright and rich the colors are. They really are eye catching! They are made with very nice quality, and haven't faded at all in the wash.

The fit is a bit loose on me. I purchased them in small. To be entirely fair, I only weigh about 98lbs and stand at 4'10", so most things hang loosely over my small frame. I actually like the loose fit. It gives them a pleasant, relaxed fit that can be worn on any occasion. I would definitely repurchase. After 3+ years of running, I have finally found my socks. I have tried a dozen different kinds of socks but always struggled with foot numbness. I wear professionally fitted Mizuno Wave Riders (a 7.5 compared to my normal size 6 in every other shoe) with Aetrex Lyncos Sport insoles to support my high arches. I have laced my shoes every which way. CEP knee-high compression socks helped my shin splints when they were bad, and delayed the numbness onset for a few more miles, but they were never tight enough in my foot. I had to wear a size 4 because of my massive calves, but my feet are tiny, so nothing was tight enough and kids' socks were complete crap that caused blisters. Finally I asked for a few pairs of these for Christmas and by December 26, my sock game had completely changed. I ran 6 miles with no numbness whatsoever. These socks allow me to tie my shoes a little tighter so my ankles have more support without my feet aching and going numb. I now need to order more pairs so that I can wear them every run (4-5 days a week) and even for elliptical workouts. I wear a size 2 in these and wish they would make a size 1 because they are still slightly loose, but hoping a couple dryer cycles will tighten them up a bit. I would not worry about your ankle circumference when ordering these, as you can add a slit to loosen the ankles but you definitely want them snug on your feet.

I have had a lot of foot trouble which can be attributed to many different injuries and problems and because I'm in retail and spend long days on my feet, the abuse continues. These socks offer some welcome relief when I get to wear them!! They are also low enough as to not be obvious, so they won't show in an oxford-type shoe as well as a sneaker.

Was a gift and was well received- the size 12 seems accurate to size. Be aware that this is a "Back to the Future" branded replica, not a "Nike" branded item. So, to look true to the film prop, I found decals on a popular online auction site and followed the directions to apply them to these shoes- it turned out looking great. It is indeed light-up in the clear bottom part, and wires with a tiny switch can be found protruding from the ankle area- this is easy to access both for charging (via included USB cable) and switching it on/off, as well as can be hidden out of sight. Great for making a Back to the Future fan very happy while sticking to a budget!
summary: Comfy shoes that can be upgraded into awesome cosplay props!

Love them for the fact that they are, well BTTF shoes! They aren't extremely identical to the actual Mags but hey for 100 bucks, they are fun to wear! Easy to mod with lighting and emblem kits you can purchase online. I actually made a swoosh out of foam adhesive and it made a huge difference! They are more "boot" like in appearance then the sock like NIKE mags but you can alter this with a little steam trick, just google HC mods. Lots of info. Lights look good when on however there is no indication when fully charged, I had these on for about 3hours and they did not die. Shoes come with a micro usb splitter cable but no power brick. I use a samsung charger instead of connecting to a USB device. Really comfy shoes for the price! Be warned... you WILL be stopped constantly if you wear these out in public. :)
summary: Fun shoes for less than 6k! Yes please!

Overall, the best bang for your buck if you're looking for BTTF2 "future" shoes. I was a bit disappointed that the tongue isn't nearly as long or as big as it should be (it barely sticks out above the velcro strap that wraps around the shoe. Only other real "complaint" was that the shoe doesn't have the "bumps" on the side like in the movie (where you would expect the "power laces" to be housed underneath the material. But the lights look and work great. Everyone at all the Halloween parties I went to loved them! :) And if you check on eBay, there's a guy in China who sells a decal kit to add the "Nike MAG" decals and swoosh to these, as well as a kit to add a light-up "Nike" logo to the velcro strap. Overall, I was quite happy with these (as I'm a HUGE BTTF fan.)

reviewText: These are official licensed by the owner's, universal studios.  So, do not get confused with the Nike Air Mag version that will run anywhere from $5,000-$7,000 a pair.  The biggest two noticeable differences are the large, puffy toe box and the lack of the words "air mags" on heels (that would violate Nike's copyrights) and the Nike swoosh. There are shoe customizers who reduce the toe box and add the "ribbed" lace impressions and the swooshes and air mag logos, but it will cost you anywhere from $500-$1200 depending on who you get, but they come out near exact.  If you wear these straight out of the box and you notice people staring, it is probably them making fun of you for wearing costume shoes.  "What are those!" Still at $99, great costume piece to have fun with.  Please do not confuse these as actual daily wear shoes, like many reviewers have.  Universal Studios clearly states these are for costume wear.  The name of the store is " FUN Costumes", come on people.
summary: Universal Studio licensed version - Costume Shoes

reviewText:
The charm is beautiful.  Both halves have Mother on one side and Daughter on the other, which I LOVE.  It's very pretty to start and looks just like the picture.  It's also a good size for the rest of my charms.

There are a few flaws, however.  One such flaw is that it is VERY top-heavy.  The only way to wear it is upside down.  I'm thinking of getting one of the rubber spacer things to see if that will fit and make it stay upright.  Also, I ordered the dark red (garnet), but it looks like a slightly-off red.  It's super similar to the other red charms I have.  Finally, the gold coating has work off already.  I've had this charm for 4 days, and the only gold left is on the top and bottom of the body.  Perfect?  Certainly not.  Worth the price?  Yes.

Edit: The silver coating is now wearing off as well.  It looks very cheap.  If you get this set, coat it with a clear nail polish first.

reviewText:
First of all I purchased these. I have never received anything for free or at a discount through Amazon and not interested in doing so. So this is an objective review. The ratings are all over the place on these but I will give it a 5 star for how well they accomplish the limited role they are filling. Sometimes people compare apples to oranges (or these to regular readers), and that misses the purpose target. So here is my take: in the last year (mid-forties so beat the 40 year average:-) ) I noticed what had been perfect vision was not so perfect for close up reading. The problem for me is I have never worn corrective glasses in my life so I have not had to remember glasses every day. If my experience with sun glasses is an indication of how I would deal with reading glasses then I needed something I would not forget and I would not sit on and crush a week or two after the purchase. These are perfect for me! As far as functionality they actually work very well for my needs. I have a wide bridge and they sit on it without issue and hold their place and do not cause discomfort. I did have to find the sweet spot on my nose to set them where it is a good mix of comfort and clarity. My reading vision with these is as clear as any Foster Grants I have tried. I stuck them on back of my phone like in all the pictures and that works very well. I do not forget my phone! It messes a little with the NFC when using Android Pay at register CC terminal but if you just flip the phone over and touch screen side to the terminal it works fine. That may just be a week CC terminal at Walgreens also, that is the only place I have tried it so far. Overall it does its job and IMO it does it VERY WELL! They are not for every face and nose out there. They should not be compared to normal over the ears glasses. They are a convenience tool. I can say they work well enough and are comfortable enough that I often choose them even when I have a normal pair of Foster Grants available. So that says something about function. Not sure about looks but that is hardly important anyway when you only use them for reading.

BTW, there is a free lifetime replacement if they ever break. They say send them and they will send out a new pair ASAP.  Being only $20-ish I am not sure it is worth the effort but for some it will be. I wish these were available in stores like Walgreens but I have not seen them but then I have not really tried. They may have info on their website if they are in stores so you can go someplace and try them out first. Being Amazon you can always return them for full refund anyway.

-Cheers!
summary: They do exactly what they are intended to do IMO. A product of convenience that works well

If the phone is placed face-up, the protrusion due to the lens case is directly in contact with the table wearing out the lens case (solved this with by adding a protective layer on the lens pocket as shown in the picture). 5 stars for the lens but overall 2.5 stars.

I purchase lots of items through Amazon, some I get for free, some I get at a discounted rate, and most I pay full price. I will always disclose if I receive an item for free or a discounted rate. I do a lot of reviews so here is a break down on how I determine my star rating of a product:

5 stars  I love it! It is awesome and I highly recommend everyone to purchase this product!
4 stars  I like it, but there are some flaws. Don't we all have flaws? I would purchase again.
3 stars - It was okay, but I would probably not buy it again unless there are no other options.
2 stars  There may be worse products out there, but you can definitely find better choices.
1 star  I dislike the product, I wish I had not purchased it and recommend others to not purchase.

If my review was helpful please click the yes button below. Thank you!

reviewText: Really nice for price, I believe in rating with price in consideration, and in this case, 5 stars are earned. It's super comfortable and lightweight, it teams up great with a time weekender.

Basically the same style and workings as economical nylon watchbands from China. Fits my 20mm Timex Weekender well. I have three of these in white, black, and blue (Love them! Classic, stylish, and inexpensive) and many watchbands to change for different outfits, etc. This leather band adds another option. Unlike the light brown noted by one reviewer as lighter than shown, the dark brown is true to the images. Also, as other reviewers notes, the leather is a bit thin, but not bad, esp. for the price compared to other leather bands. Probably wouldn't last too long under tough conditions (wouldn't get it wet, for example). However, if, like me, you plan to change it out and use it along with other bands, it should fine in that way. Like another buyer, I have a big wrist and the fit is very good w/lots of holes to adjust sizing. Since it didn't cost a mint and shipping was free, I can get another when this one wears out. Overall, I am quite happy with it.
summary: Good band for the money. Wears like an economical nylon band.

UPDATE: I am upgrading to two stars for now.  TQS contacted me and apologized for the mistake.  They offered to send a replacement and it's on its way.  They also personally checked the one they are sending.  What is lacking in QC is looking like it will be made up for in customer service!  Update to follow when the replacement is received.

UPDATE 2: So after receiving a replacement I am feeling a bit better.  Obviously the QA needs a bit of work given that I'm not the only one who received a flawed item.  The replacement I got has a working clasp and the chain is fine.  It's definitely a costume item, and this is reinforced by the price.  For what you pay it's reasonable for the item you get.

I'm not a super fashionable person, I think I have cute clothes but I am not really one to take fashion risks typically. When these earrings came I was surprised at the style. The pearl is much larger than I thought it would be. I tried wearing them with the pearl in the front and I thought they were very funny looking on me, I contacted the seller to ask about the size of the pearl and they wrote back explaining that a larger pearl size is intentional, and sent me pictures of different celebrities wearing these earrings. They both wear them with the pearl in the back of the lobe, looks great on them! I definitely like them way better when I wear them with the pearl in the back of the lobe, still getting used to it but they are really cute. And if I'm feeling a little less adventurous some days I can always use a regular backing instead of the pearl backing. Also I love the design, and I love the thin metal for the piece that goes through the lobe, if feels so nice and thin. These earrings feel nice and sturdy not cheap at all.

I added pics below of the earrings I ordered, as well as the celebs wearing them. Also I took one pic with them next to my pearl necklace see you can see the difference in size.

I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. All opinions are my own.

I received this pendant in exchange for an honest review. All opinions are my own.

Eye catching when in direct light, the pendant really sparkles. I like the color (red) it was my favorite out of the choices of different fashion jewelry sets from AmaziPro8. I wish the chain were a little longer but I can easily exchange it with another one of my necklaces and still wear the pendant. (I just prefer longer chains).. The pendant itself is pretty, reminds me of a ruby *my birthstone*! The silver decoration is a great compliment to the color coming from the pendant and makes the necklace look very elegant. I had no problems with the pendant flipping over like some necklaces tend to do while wearing them. The pendant stays flat and stands out, always catching the light and sparkling. The way the pendant is cut the light is able to catch it from so many different angles, grabbing attention most of the time. I have already had compliments while wearing the necklace..so it is very noticeable. The set has a headphone dust plug that is great for covering the unused cellphone headphone jack. It has a notch that really holds the plug in the phone nicely. I have not had it drop out once, this is great! Keeps dust out of my phone and also adds a bit of sparkle *bling* to my cellphone! I was provided a discounted sample for evaluation and review.
summary: Bling Necklace, and Cellphone dust plug! Catches the light, attention grabber!
